name: Extreme Car Driving Sim
description:
Do you have the experience of high octane drifting in a huge open driving world? Surely not! Let's press the metal pedal and do not take your feet off unless you touch the blazing speed of a high speed car. Enjoy heavy vehicle drifting in the fully customized racing environment. Adventure adrenaline intense speed drifting in Extreme Car Driving Sim

Features :
- Realistic 3D Graphics.
- Smooth and Easy Controls.
- Challenging Levels.
- Real Luxury Sports Cars.
